resources.string: Select the game to save laptimes for

GTLapTimer by L.B.

 Developed with IntelliJ IDEA on a Nexus 7 

 The background texture is part of the free Graphite Texture Pack by Enigma Design: http://enigma-design.deviantart.com/art/Graphite-Texture-Pack-91094259 

 I do not own any of the brands or names used in this application. This is a purely fan-made app to appreciate and support the GT series.
